attributes.action: The Right Of Free British Citizen's To Keep And Bear Arms.
attributes.additional_details: It is a fundamental human right to keep and bear arms for self defence against criminality, terrorism, and govt tyranny.
attributes.background: To allow free British citizen's to keep and bear arms for self defence.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Allow UK citizens licences to carry firearms & other weapons for self-defence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587732
